# HTML to React project conversion (2026-01-17 08:16Z)

_**User (2026-01-17 08:16Z)**_

I have code in html of my project. i need you to convert it into react and create the project/file structure. Remove the unnecessary files/folders after converting to react.  convert the html to react first



this is an overview of the app 



SmartTriage is a web-based AI-assisted ticket classification and priority management system designed to help support teams handle customer issues more efficiently. The system provides a simplified ticketing workflow similar to tools like Jira or Bitrix, enhanced with intelligent analysis to support faster and more consistent decision-making.



At its core, SmartTriage allows users to create and manage support tickets while automatically analyzing ticket content using rule-based Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques. When a ticket is submitted, the system evaluates the text to identify the issue category, detect urgency and sentiment, and compute an explainable priority score. These AI-generated insights help support agents quickly understand the severity of issues and determine which tickets require immediate attention.

The system is built using a modern full-stack architecture, with React for the frontend user interface, Node.js with Express for backend logic and API handling, and Supabase (PostgreSQL) for secure and scalable data storage. AI processing is handled entirely within the backend using free and open-source NLP libraries, ensuring transparency, reliability, and independence from paid third-party AI services.

SmartTriage supports role-based access for Administrators and Support Agents. Administrators can oversee all tickets, assign agents, and monitor system analytics, while support agents focus on resolving tickets using the AI-assisted recommendations provided by the system. By combining traditional ticket management with explainable AI support, SmartTriage improves response efficiency, reduces manual triage effort, and enhances overall service quality.

+ import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom'
+ import Login from './pages/Login'
+ import TicketListDashboard from './pages/TicketListDashboard'
+ import CreateNewTicket from './pages/CreateNewTicket'
+ import TicketDetails from './pages/TicketDetails'
+ import ProfileAndSettings from './pages/ProfileAndSettings'
+ import AdminAnalyticsOverview from './pages/AdminAnalyticsOverview'
+ import UserManagement from './pages/UserManagement'
+ 
+ function App() {
+   return (
+     &lt;Router&gt;
+       &lt;Routes&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/login" element={&lt;Login /&gt;} /&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/dashboard" element={&lt;TicketListDashboard /&gt;} /&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/tickets/create" element={&lt;CreateNewTicket /&gt;} /&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/tickets/:id" element={&lt;TicketDetails /&gt;} /&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/profile" element={&lt;ProfileAndSettings /&gt;} /&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/analytics" element={&lt;AdminAnalyticsOverview /&gt;} /&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/users" element={&lt;UserManagement /&gt;} /&gt;
+         &lt;Route path="/" element={&lt;Navigate to="/login" replace /&gt;} /&gt;
+       &lt;/Routes&gt;
+     &lt;/Router&gt;
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ export default App
```

- 
+ import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'
+ 
+ interface SidebarProps {
+   currentUser?: {
+     name: string
+     role: string
+     avatar?: string
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export default function Sidebar({ currentUser }: SidebarProps) {
+   const location = useLocation()
+   
+   const navItems = [
+     { path: '/dashboard', icon: 'confirmation_number', label: 'Tickets' },
+     { path: '/tickets/create', icon: 'add_circle', label: 'Create' },
+     { path: '/analytics', icon: 'bar_chart', label: 'Analytics' },
+     { path: '/users', icon: 'group', label: 'Users' },
+     { path: '/profile', icon: 'settings', label: 'Settings' },
+   ]
+ 
+   const isActive = (path: string) =&gt; {
+     if (path === '/dashboard') {
+       return location.pathname === '/dashboard'
+     }
+     return location.pathname.startsWith(path)
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;aside className="w-64 border-r border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 flex flex-col sticky top-0 h-screen"&gt;
+       &lt;div className="p-6 flex items-center gap-3"&gt;
+         &lt;div className="size-9 bg-primary rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center text-white"&gt;
+           &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined"&gt;auto_awesome&lt;/span&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;div&gt;
+           &lt;h1 className="text-base font-bold leading-none"&gt;SmartTriage&lt;/h1&gt;
+           &lt;p className="text-[10px] text-primary font-bold uppercase tracking-widest mt-1"&gt;Enterprise AI&lt;/p&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;nav className="flex-1 px-3 space-y-1"&gt;
+         {navItems.map((item) =&gt; (
+           &lt;Link
+             key={item.path}
+             to={item.path}
+             className={&#96;flex items-center gap-3 px-3 py-2.5 rounded-lg transition-colors group ${
+               isActive(item.path)
+                 ? 'sidebar-active'
+                 : 'text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400 hover:bg-slate-50 dark:hover:bg-slate-800'
+             }&#96;}
+           &gt;
+             &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-[22px]"&gt;{item.icon}&lt;/span&gt;
+             &lt;span className="text-sm font-semibold"&gt;{item.label}&lt;/span&gt;
+           &lt;/Link&gt;
+         ))}
+       &lt;/nav&gt;
+       &lt;div className="p-4 border-t border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800"&gt;
+         &lt;Link
+           to="/tickets/create"
+           className="w-full bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-white rounded-lg py-2.5 px-4 text-sm font-bold flex items-center justify-center gap-2 transition-all shadow-sm"
+         &gt;
+           &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-sm"&gt;add&lt;/span&gt;
+           New Ticket
+         &lt;/Link&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       {currentUser &amp;&amp; (
+         &lt;div className="p-4 border-t border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800"&gt;
+           &lt;div className="flex items-center gap-3"&gt;
+             &lt;div
+               className="size-10 rounded-full border-2 border-primary/20 bg-cover bg-center"
+               style={{ backgroundImage: currentUser.avatar ? &#96;url(${currentUser.avatar})&#96; : undefined }}
+             &gt;
+               {!currentUser.avatar &amp;&amp; (
+                 &lt;div className="size-10 rounded-full bg-primary/20 flex items-center justify-center text-primary font-bold"&gt;
+                   {currentUser.name.charAt(0)}
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
+               )}
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div className="text-right hidden sm:block"&gt;
+               &lt;p className="text-xs font-bold leading-none"&gt;{currentUser.name}&lt;/p&gt;
+               &lt;p className="text-[10px] text-slate-500 font-medium mt-1"&gt;{currentUser.role}&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       )}
+     &lt;/aside&gt;
+   )
+ }
```

+             &gt;
+               {!currentUser.avatar &amp;&amp; (
+                 &lt;div className="size-10 rounded-full bg-primary/20 flex items-center justify-center text-primary font-bold"&gt;
+                   {currentUser.name.charAt(0)}
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
+               )}
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         )}
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/header&gt;
+   )
+ }
```

</details>

</tool-use>

+           &lt;button className="px-6 py-2 bg-red-500 text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-black hover:bg-red-600 transition-all"&gt;
+             Deactivate Account
+           &lt;/button&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/footer&gt;
+     &lt;/Layout&gt;
+   )
+ }
```

</details>

</tool-use>

+                 &lt;th className="px-6 py-4 text-xs font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-widest"&gt;Email Address&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="px-6 py-4 text-xs font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-widest"&gt;Role&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="px-6 py-4 text-xs font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-widest"&gt;Status&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="px-6 py-4 text-xs font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-widest text-right"&gt;Actions&lt;/th&gt;
+               &lt;/tr&gt;
+             &lt;/thead&gt;
+             &lt;tbody className="divide-y divide-slate-200 dark:divide-slate-800"&gt;
+               {users.map((user) =&gt; (
+                 &lt;tr key={user.id} className={&#96;hover:bg-slate-50/80 dark:hover:bg-slate-800/40 transition-colors ${user.status === 'Inactive' ? 'opacity-70' : ''}&#96;}&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="px-6 py-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;input className="rounded border-slate-300 text-primary focus:ring-primary" type="checkbox" /&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="px-6 py-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;div className="flex items-center gap-3"&gt;
+                       &lt;div className="size-10 rounded-lg bg-primary/10 flex items-center justify-center text-primary font-bold overflow-hidden border border-primary/20"&gt;
+                         {user.avatar &amp;&amp; (
+                           &lt;img className="w-full h-full object-cover" src={user.avatar} alt={&#96;${user.name} profile picture&#96;} /&gt;
+                         )}
+                         {!user.avatar &amp;&amp; user.name.charAt(0)}
+                       &lt;/div&gt;
+                       &lt;div&gt;
+                         &lt;p className={&#96;font-bold text-slate-900 dark:text-white ${user.status === 'Inactive' ? 'line-through' : ''}&#96;}&gt;
+                           {user.name}
+                         &lt;/p&gt;
+                         &lt;p className="text-xs text-slate-500"&gt;Joined {user.joinedDate}&lt;/p&gt;
+                       &lt;/div&gt;
+                     &lt;/div&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="px-6 py-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;span className="text-sm font-medium text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400"&gt;{user.email}&lt;/span&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="px-6 py-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;span className={&#96;inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold border ${getRoleClass(user.role)}&#96;}&gt;
+                       &lt;span className="size-1.5 rounded-full bg-primary"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
+                       {user.role}
+                     &lt;/span&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="px-6 py-4"&gt;
+                     {user.status === 'Active' ? (
+                       &lt;span className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-1 rounded-md bg-emerald-100 dark:bg-emerald-900/30 text-emerald-700 dark:text-emerald-400 text-xs font-bold"&gt;
+                         &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-[14px]"&gt;check_circle&lt;/span&gt;
+                         Active
+                       &lt;/span&gt;
+                     ) : (
+                       &lt;span className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-1 rounded-md bg-slate-100 dark:bg-slate-800 text-slate-500 dark:text-slate-400 text-xs font-bold"&gt;
+                         &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-[14px]"&gt;block&lt;/span&gt;
+                         Inactive
+                       &lt;/span&gt;
+                     )}
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="px-6 py-4 text-right"&gt;
+                     &lt;div className="flex items-center justify-end gap-2"&gt;
+                       &lt;button className="p-2 text-slate-400 hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 rounded-lg transition-all" title="Edit User"&gt;
+                         &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-[20px]"&gt;edit&lt;/span&gt;
+                       &lt;/button&gt;
+                       {user.status === 'Active' ? (
+                         &lt;button className="p-2 text-slate-400 hover:text-red-500 hover:bg-red-50 rounded-lg transition-all" title="Deactivate User"&gt;
+                           &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-[20px]"&gt;person_off&lt;/span&gt;
+                         &lt;/button&gt;
+                       ) : (
+                         &lt;button className="p-2 text-emerald-500 hover:bg-emerald-50 rounded-lg transition-all" title="Reactivate User"&gt;
+                           &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-[20px]"&gt;person_check&lt;/span&gt;
+                         &lt;/button&gt;
+                       )}
+                     &lt;/div&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                 &lt;/tr&gt;
+               ))}
+             &lt;/tbody&gt;
+           &lt;/table&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;div className="p-4 bg-slate-50/50 dark:bg-slate-800/50 border-t border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 flex items-center justify-between"&gt;
+           &lt;p className="text-sm text-slate-500"&gt;Showing &lt;span className="font-bold text-slate-900 dark:text-white"&gt;1-10&lt;/span&gt; of &lt;span className="font-bold text-slate-900 dark:text-white"&gt;42&lt;/span&gt; users&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;div className="flex items-center gap-2"&gt;
+             &lt;button className="p-2 rounded-lg border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700 hover:bg-white dark:hover:bg-slate-800 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-all" disabled&gt;
+               &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined"&gt;chevron_left&lt;/span&gt;
+             &lt;/button&gt;
+             &lt;button className="size-8 rounded-lg bg-primary text-white font-bold text-sm"&gt;1&lt;/button&gt;
+             &lt;button className="size-8 rounded-lg hover:bg-white dark:hover:bg-slate-800 font-bold text-sm transition-all text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400"&gt;2&lt;/button&gt;
+             &lt;button className="size-8 rounded-lg hover:bg-white dark:hover:bg-slate-800 font-bold text-sm transition-all text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400"&gt;3&lt;/button&gt;
+             &lt;span className="px-1 text-slate-400"&gt;...&lt;/span&gt;
+             &lt;button className="size-8 rounded-lg hover:bg-white dark:hover:bg-slate-800 font-bold text-sm transition-all text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400"&gt;5&lt;/button&gt;
+             &lt;button className="p-2 rounded-lg border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700 hover:bg-white dark:hover:bg-slate-800 transition-all"&gt;
+               &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined"&gt;chevron_right&lt;/span&gt;
+             &lt;/button&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;div className="mt-8 p-6 bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/5 to-transparent rounded-2xl border border-primary/10 flex items-center justify-between"&gt;
+         &lt;div className="flex items-center gap-4"&gt;
+           &lt;div className="size-12 rounded-xl bg-primary/20 flex items-center justify-center text-primary"&gt;
+             &lt;span className="material-symbols-outlined text-[28px]"&gt;smart_toy&lt;/span&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;div&gt;
+             &lt;h4 className="font-bold text-slate-900 dark:text-white"&gt;AI Seat Optimization&lt;/h4&gt;
+             &lt;p className="text-sm text-slate-500 max-w-md"&gt;3 redundant "Agent" seats identified. AI analysis suggests you could reallocate these to "Analyst" roles based on current ticket volume.&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;button className="px-4 py-2 text-primary font-bold text-sm hover:underline"&gt;View Analysis&lt;/button&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/Layout&gt;
+   )
+ }
```

</details>

</tool-use>

- 
+ # SmartTriage
+ 
+ A web-based AI-assisted ticket classification and priority management system designed to help support teams handle customer issues more efficiently.
+ 
+ ## Overview
+ 
+ SmartTriage is a modern full-stack ticketing system built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The application provides:
+ 
+ - **AI-Assisted Ticket Management**: Automatic categorization and priority scoring
+ - **Role-Based Access**: Support for Administrators and Support Agents
+ - **Real-time Analytics**: Dashboard with insights and metrics
+ - **User Management**: Comprehensive team member administration
+ - **Responsive Design**: Works seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices
+ 
+ ## Tech Stack
+ 
+ - **Frontend**: React 18 with TypeScript
+ - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
+ - **Routing**: React Router v6
+ - **Build Tool**: Vite
+ - **Icons**: Material Symbols
+ 
+ ## Getting Started
+ 
+ ### Prerequisites
+ 
+ - Node.js 18+ and npm/yarn/pnpm
+ 
+ ### Installation
+ 
+ 1. Install dependencies:
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;bash
+ npm install
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;
+ 
+ 2. Start the development server:
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;bash
+ npm run dev
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;
+ 
+ 3. Open your browser and navigate to &#96;http://localhost:5173&#96;
+ 
+ ### Available Scripts
+ 
+ - &#96;npm run dev&#96; - Start development server
+ - &#96;npm run build&#96; - Build for production
+ - &#96;npm run preview&#96; - Preview production build
+ - &#96;npm run lint&#96; - Run ESLint
+ 
+ ## Project Structure
+ 
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;
+ src/
+ ├── components/      # Shared React components (Layout, Sidebar, Header)
+ ├── pages/          # Page components (Login, Dashboard, etc.)
+ ├── App.tsx         # Main application component with routing
+ ├── main.tsx        # Application entry point
+ └── index.css       # Global styles and Tailwind directives
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;
+ 
+ ## Features
+ 
+ ### Pages
+ 
+ - **Login** (&#96;/login&#96;) - User authentication
+ - **Dashboard** (&#96;/dashboard&#96;) - Ticket list view with filtering and search
+ - **Create Ticket** (&#96;/tickets/create&#96;) - Create new support tickets
+ - **Ticket Details** (&#96;/tickets/:id&#96;) - View ticket details with AI analysis
+ - **Profile &amp; Settings** (&#96;/profile&#96;) - User profile and preferences
+ - **Analytics** (&#96;/analytics&#96;) - Admin analytics dashboard
+ - **User Management** (&#96;/users&#96;) - Team member administration
+ 
+ ## License
+ 
+ © 2024 SmartTriage Inc. All rights reserved.
```

## Project structure

- React + TypeScript + Vite setup
- Tailwind CSS configuration matching the original design
- React Router for navigation
- All 7 HTML pages converted to React components
- Shared components (Layout, Sidebar, Header) extracted and reusable

## Pages converted

1. **Login** (`/login`) - Authentication page
2. **Ticket List Dashboard** (`/dashboard`) - Main ticket view with table and filters
3. **Create New Ticket** (`/tickets/create`) - Ticket creation form
4. **Ticket Details & AI Analysis** (`/tickets/:id`) - Ticket detail with AI insights
5. **Profile and Settings** (`/profile`) - User profile and preferences
6. **Admin Analytics Overview** (`/analytics`) - Analytics dashboard
7. **User Management** (`/users`) - Team member administration

## Next steps

1. Install dependencies:
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

2. Start the development server:
   ```bash
   npm run dev
   ```

3. Build for production:
   ```bash
   npm run build
   ```

All old HTML files and folders have been removed. The React app maintains the original design, styling, and functionality, using React components and routing instead of static HTML.

The project is ready to use. You can now add backend integration, state management, and additional features as needed.
